item.title: Geography
item.description:
Videos 3d model of Nazaré Canyon off the coast of #Nazare, Portugal. Well known as hotspot for big wave surfing.
Graphics The blue veins of the Earth for the Iberian Peninsula. Science is art.Line width reflects river size. Data: https://hydrosheds.org/ River flow directions were estimated using vectorial data. River flow directions were estimated using vectorial data. Orientations of coast segements were estimated using vectorial data with a resolución of 9 vertices to 1 km.

item.title: Population
item.description: Population movement registered with mobile phones at 12:00 in the morning compared to 20:00 in Spain. Data: INE Population movements registered with mobile phones in the COVID19 pandemic in Spain. Data: INE Population movements registered with mobile phones in november 2019 in Spain. Data: INE Population point clouds of Ourense since 1975. Data: IGE Population pyramid of Galicia since 1975. Data: IGE Population pyramid of Galician provinces since 1975.
